error.startDate.conflict: Date start must be after date end of last contract
error.endDate.conflict: End date can't be between of others contract
error.endDate.input: End date can't be smaller than start date
error.endDate.today: End date can't be smaller than today
error.active.conflict: Can't have two contracts active at the same time
error.endDate.lessThanStartDate: End date can't be earlier than start date
error.endDate.moreThanEndDate: End date can't be greater than contract end date
